<JD_START>
Job Title: Scooter Deployment Driver

Location: Denver, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position: Scooter Deployment Driver

Location: Denver, CO

Pay: $19/hr

Experience: 1+ years driving a large vehicle (Box Truck or Sprinter Van) required

Education: High school diploma or GED

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Friday-Monday, 7:30 a.m. to 6 p.m.

HireOne is seeking a Scooter Deployment Driver to join a growing and dynamic team!

Job Description:

Operate a sprinter van, golf cart, e-trike and/or deployment vehicle to safely deploy, reposition and pick up bikes and scootersFollow all safety and road guidelines at all timesLocate and recover missing bikes and scooters from all areasEnsure that all scooters and bikes are functioning, safe and cleanSafely test bike/scooter for inspection purposes and only as needed to complete the required task

Position Requirements:

Knowledge of city geography and street layoutObtains strong organizational skills with a strong attention to detail and accuracyStrong verbal and written communication skillsAbility to lift up to 50 lbs. and to stoop, bend, and stand for long periods of timeAbility to be flexible to work nights and weekends as neededExperience with basic computer skills (e.g. Excel) and proficient experience with phone applicationsStrict adherence to safety standardsMust be comfortable with continuous lifting of up to 50lbs.Conducting trips of up to 60 scooters/bikes per tripMust have a valid driver's license

HireOne does not just connect you with a job; we offer a Professional Mentoring & Education Program to help you be great at your job, love it, and grow.

HireOne is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how labor is bought, sold and delivered to enable universal access to the American Dream.

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
